con:method.name: getCredential
con:method.con:description: Bulk operation to retrieve a single Credential, which are granted by national bodies, professional associations or other interested parties.

con:parameter.con:name: page
con:parameter.con:description: Return nth page of results; default 0 `page=2`; applies to any call with repeated data

con:parameter.con:name: max
con:parameter.con:description: Maximum items per page, default 10,000; `max=100`; applies to any call with repeated data

con:parameter.con:name: unwrap
con:parameter.con:description: Remove top level wrapper from json results in single result reponses; `unwrap=1`

con:parameter.con:name: human
con:parameter.con:description: For code set fields, translate code to human readable form; `human=1`

con:parameter.con:name: field
con:parameter.con:description: Field to filter on when used with **pattern**; `field=FamilyName`

con:parameter.con:name: Accept
con:parameter.con:description: Standard HTTP accept header, choose between JSON and XML for response. Defaults to XML if this header is missing.

con:parameter.con:name: CredentialRefId
con:parameter.con:description: Unique identifier (GUID) that uniquely identifies the particular version or edition of the Credential.

con:representation.con:sampleContent: <Credential> <CredentialRefId>2b560779-872b-4491-afd6-3c6bd5f1c8cc</CredentialRefId> <CredentialLocalId>91165</CredentialLocalId> <Title>NCEA Level 2 - Endorsed with Merit</Title> <VersionNo>2</VersionNo> <Administrator> <RefId>3d614c16-9046-47d1-87b5-51438590de15</RefId> <Name>NZQA</Name> </Administrator> <Description>Achieved sufficient credits endorsed with merit</Description> <Status>PU</Status> <Level>2</Level> </Credential>

con:method.name: updateCredential
con:method.con:description: Bulk operation to update a single Credential, which are granted by national bodies, professional associations or other interested parties.

con:parameter.con:name: Accept
con:parameter.con:description: Standard HTTP accept header, choose between JSON and XML for response. Defaults to XML if this header is missing.

con:parameter.con:name: CredentialRefId
con:parameter.con:description: Unique identifier (GUID) that uniquely identifies the particular version or edition of the Credential.

con:representation.con:sampleContent: <Credential> <CredentialRefId>2b560779-872b-4491-afd6-3c6bd5f1c8cc</CredentialRefId> <CredentialLocalId>91165</CredentialLocalId> <Title>NCEA Level 2 - Endorsed with Merit</Title> <VersionNo>2</VersionNo> <Administrator> <RefId>3d614c16-9046-47d1-87b5-51438590de15</RefId> <Name>NZQA</Name> </Administrator> <Description>Achieved sufficient credits endorsed with merit</Description> <Status>PU</Status> <Level>2</Level> </Credential>

<Credential> <CredentialRefId>2b560779-872b-4491-afd6-3c6bd5f1c8cc</CredentialRefId> <CredentialLocalId>91165</CredentialLocalId> <Title>NCEA Level 2 - Endorsed with Merit</Title> <VersionNo>2</VersionNo> <Administrator> <RefId>3d614c16-9046-47d1-87b5-51438590de15</RefId> <Name>NZQA</Name> </Administrator> <Description>Achieved sufficient credits endorsed with merit</Description> <Status>PU</Status> <Level>2</Level> </Credential>

con:request.name: Request 1
con:request.con:request: {\r "Credential" : {\r "CredentialRefId" : "2b560779-872b-4491-afd6-3c6bd5f1c8cc",\r "CredentialLocalId" : "91165",\r "Title" : "NCEA Level 2 - Endorsed with Merit",\r "VersionNo" : 2,\r "Administrator" : {\r "RefId" : "3d614c16-9046-47d1-87b5-51438590de15",\r "Name" : "NZQA"\r },\r "Description" : "Achieved sufficient credits endorsed with merit",\r "Status" : "PU",\r "Level" : "2"\r }\r }

con:method.name: patchCredential
con:method.con:description: Bulk operation to update some fields of a single Credential, which are granted by national bodies, professional associations or other interested parties.

con:parameter.con:name: Accept
con:parameter.con:description: Standard HTTP accept header, choose between JSON and XML for response. Defaults to XML if this header is missing.

con:parameter.con:name: CredentialRefId
con:parameter.con:description: Unique identifier (GUID) that uniquely identifies the particular version or edition of the Credential.
